channel.title: Version 4.0 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 4.0.0 (2022-06-05) Break'n Break'n Th' custom_css config parameter was removed from th' configurat'n. If used 'n an exist'n installat'n, it can be achieved by overrid'n th' custom-header.html template 'n a much more generic manner.
